  * DISCUSSION : conversion constructor to handle nil - should it be generated every time; only for auto generated multi-method conversion routine;

    (method ( SyntaxKey::DirectResend message ( SyntaxKey::Target r ) ))

  * Nullable should have special conversion constructor to handle nil 
  * Nullable - ValueOrDefault to returen value or default value
